lead_paragraph: Malaysia's Lee Chong Wei believes his return to the top of world rankings after serving a doping ban will strengthen his bid for an elusive Olympic gold in his final Games at Rio in August.

headline.print_headline: Olympics: Ranking Boost Gives Lee Hope of Elusive Badminton Gold
headline.main: Olympics: Ranking Boost Gives Lee Hope of Elusive Badminton Gold
